column2: ENGLISH

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Comintern Chairman no longer supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the star systems of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], but rather [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Comintern Chairman can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the star systems of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. The Comintern Chairman now support [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] to be granted the titles.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Comintern Chairman can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the star systems of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. The Comintern Chairman now supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetHerHis] heir [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the throne.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Comintern Chairman has decided to start supporting you as the recipient for the star systems of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], after the death of [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Comintern Chairman has decided to start supporting you as the recipient for the star systems of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I see.
I thank you, my friend.

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Comintern Chairman no longer supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the star systems of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName]. With no fitting ruler, I will let your brave people decide who these titles might befit.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Comintern Chairman can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the star systems of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. With no fitting ruler available, I will let your brave people decide who will receive these titles.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I might have someone in mind.
Any pledged participant with the ?YPapal Recipient Stance?! will have their stance changed to ?YBeneficiary Recipient Stance?!

[Root.GetTitledName]
I know we have had our differences, but it pleases me to hear you have decided to join our rightful cause. I have made the preparations to recant your excommunication from the church.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Thank you, Comrade Chairman.
The Scientific Prepare for War

A messenger approaches us with a letter from the Comintern Chairman. [From.GetSheHeCap] is asking us to prepare our men to fight against religious liars, to liberate innocent fooled people. 

The Comintern Chairman wants to send our Universalist soldiers against [crusade_title.GetBaseName]. The region is held by [crusade_character.GetCrusadeReligionDescription] [crusade_character.GetTitledName], and it is time to free people there.

Though the Comintern Chairman wants to invade [crusade_title.GetBaseName], a persuasive Universalist could convince everyone to focus on another objective that is of more value to us.
I should consider preparing my men.
My men are ready! To [crusade_title.GetBaseName]!
The preparations for the next Liberation begins.
I wish my fellow Universalists luck!

Dear [Root.GetTitledName]
It has come to my attention you have not participated in our great Liberation. I have decided that it is time for you to pay back the favor you owe me, and be part of this endeavor.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I guess I will go then...
I will support the Liberation.

Greetings, [Root.GetTitledName]

I was informed the heathen Comintern Chairman have declared a will to bring an invasion to your doorsteps. As a fellow [From.Religion.GetName], I pledge to stand by your side when the unfaithful come to take your star systems.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I thank you, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
International Secular Liberation for [crusade_title.GetBaseName]

In a grand announcement the Comintern Chairman declares [crusade_title.GetCrusadeLaunchAnother]Liberation for [crusade_title.GetBaseName]. [Root.GetCrusadeLaunchFirstPart]

[Root.GetCrusadeLaunchSecondPart]

We will have glorious victories in the righteous war.
Forward!
Those [From.Religion.GetGroupName] heathens!
The International Secular Liberation for [crusade_title.GetName] begins.
Victorious Liberators

[From.Religion.GetHighGodName] has granted [new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetTitledName] victory in the Liberation for [new_crusade_title.GetBaseName]. [new_crusade_target_char.GetTitledName] has been beaten at every turn through the war, and [new_crusade_target_char.GetSheHe] has finally had to give up on [new_crusade_target_char.GetHerHis] holdings in [new_crusade_title.GetBaseName].

[Root.GetCrusadeSelfishOrNot]

With the [new_crusade_target_char.Religion.GetGroupName]s being pushed out of their old star systems, there are certainly more conflicts to come.
Red Army is the strongest!
Cursed capitalists!
